doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 27 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/30/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 27 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/30/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. USA Today poll finds American fathers fear their children becoming gay2. Jerry Fallwell warns of financial disaster for the anti-gay organization Liberty Christian AcademyCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine 3. 4th of July Interview with "the Statue of Liberty" (Bill Baumer in a costume)4. National Association of Business Councils folds5. Andy Humm discusses the concept of liberty and discriminationCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse Sale6. House revises the codes prohibiting sexual assault to include men7. Official Stamp Out AIDS stamps announced8. HTLVIII antibody found in only 1% of infected persons' saliva8. Yoga seminars offered to assist those with AIDS in keeping healthy, physically and mentally9. Washington DC mayor signs into law a bill prohibiting insurance companies from denying coverage to those who test positive for the HTLVIII antibodyCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp10. Sport Report11. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with Kevin Madden discussing volunteering at GMHC12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:COMMERCIAL: Freedom Cruise '86 AIDS Benefit1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff Bixby, taped recording from Cincinnati Gay PrideCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" magazine2. Interview with Michael Musto, Village Voice columnist, on his book "Downtown," documenting the night scene in 1980s New York CityCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment3. Coverage of the Gay and Lesbian Community Services Center's 3rd Annual Garden PartyCOMMERCIAL: Water Front Airways
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 27 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/30/1986]: June 1986
